trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing the site from which it originated.
This class cannot be inherited.
A code assembly satisfies a site membership condition if that code originates from the Web site specified by <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼組件符合站台的成員資格條件，如果該程式碼來自所指定的網站<xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Site identity is defined for code from URLs with any protocol except FILE.
trans-unit.target: 網站識別為 Url 中使用任何通訊協定檔案以外的程式碼定義。

trans-unit.source: A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present.
trans-unit.target: 站台是之間的字串"/ /"的 URL 和下列通訊協定之後"/"，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: For example, www.fourthcoffee.com is the site identity in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm.
trans-unit.target: 例如，www.fourthcoffee.com 是網站中的識別 URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。

trans-unit.source: This excludes port numbers.
If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000.
trans-unit.target: 如果給定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站台是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。

trans-unit.source: Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("*") prefix at the dot delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 網站可以完全相符，或者使用萬用字元 ("*") 在點分隔符號的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: For example, the site name *.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.
trans-unit.target: 例如，站台名稱 *。 fourthcoffee.com 符合 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。不使用萬用字元，站台名稱必須完全相符。

trans-unit.source: The site name * will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence.
trans-unit.target: 站台名稱 * 會比對任何站台，但不是會符合任何網站辨識項的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The site name or wildcard expression.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition" /> class with name of the site that determines membership.
Code satisfies this membership condition if it is downloaded from a site whose DNS name matches the site specified by <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼符合這個成員資格條件，如果它從其 DNS 名稱符合所指定的站台的站台下載<xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="site" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="site" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Site" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> against which to make the test.
Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This membership condition tests only <xref:System.Security.Policy.Site> evidence.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員資格條件只測試<xref:System.Security.Policy.Site>辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition" /> object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition" />.

Determines whether the site from the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition" /> object is equivalent to the site contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition" />.

<see langword="true" /> if the site from the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition" /> object is equivalent to the site contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> property for the current object or the specified object is <see langword="null" />.
Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> context, used to resolve <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> references.
Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
Gets the hash code for the current membership condition.
The hash code for the current membership condition.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the site for which the membership condition tests.
The site for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 站台，用來測試成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: This property is matched against the site from which a code assembly originates to test the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性比對要測試的成員資格條件的程式碼組件來源站台。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> to <see langword="null" />.
An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> to an invalid <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Site" />.
Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
A string representation of the membership condition.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> context, used to resolve <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> references.
Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
